verses.name: 2 Samuel 20:20
verses.text: And Joab answered and said, Far be it, far be it from me, that I should swallow up or destroy.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 20:21
verses.text: The matter is not so: but a man of mount Ephraim, Sheba the son of Bichri by name, hath lifted up his hand against the king, even against David: deliver him only, and I will depart from the city. And the woman said unto Joab, Behold, his head shall be thrown to thee over the wall.
